roleset.name: feeling agitated and in need of scratching
roleset.note: ITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'itch' based on sentences in brown. (from itch.01-v predicate notes)
ITCHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from itchy.01-j)

example.name: itching-j
example.text: Itching skin, considered ``just nerves'', was eased by treating with whiskey and salt.

example.name: itch-v: verbal, sorta
example.text: From the way *trace* the wound in his head was itching [*T*-1], Dan knew that it would heal.

example.name: itching-n: Basic
example.text: Wendy's itching improved after several doses of antihistamines.

example.name: itchy-j
example.text: Maybe if I 'm getting bloody noses all over the place , my eyes are red and itchy because I 'm so dried out by the new allergy meds
example.arg: Maybe if I'm getting bloody noses all over the place
because I'm so dried out by the new allergy meds

roleset.name: want badly to do something
roleset.note: ITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'itch' based on sentences in brown. (from itch.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: itch-v: yearning burning
example.text: And even deeper than that: his fear lest in this closed hall he should suddenly itch [*] to relieve himself.
